Text: Audio gets really out of sync, and is hard to keep fixed with VLC. I'm picky, but I found it unwatchable.

This is not the best version. Yes, it's got the better soundtrack, but it's 24 minutes shorter than the director's cut/European versions. More importantly, it's in a small black box in the player window, because it hasn't been ripped properly. Video quality is average.
A=8
V=7

Any way we can get a better copy posted?
